title: Community
content:
This page contains the association member directory and map as well as all the governing documents, such as CC&Rs, By Laws, Design Requirements and so forth.

The current association map can be found here: WKBCA Map

The contact information for each association member can be found here (excel): WKBCA Contact List (Excel)

Or here (pdf): WKBCA Contact List (PDF)

The association governing documents can be found here: WKBCA Governance

The association insurance documents can be found here: WKBCA Insurance

The rental registry can be found here (members who rent must update the registry with their renter information): WKBCA Rental Registry

The request form for front gate passes can be found here (passes are assigned to owner-owned or long-term-tenant owned vehicles only and are not transferrable): WKBCA Vehicle Pass Request
